messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] building this country
messages.msgSnippet: ... What ... Oh, God Forbid!  Certainly not.  Organ meat isn t kosher.   brenda Excuse me? Chopped liver is NOT Kosher? Maybe chopped pig liver ~Elissa
messages.messageBody:
> Uh, Bob? What about the Jews who were here helping to build this country?
What
> were they, chopped liver?

Oh, God Forbid! Certainly not. Organ meat isn't kosher. <g>

brenda


Excuse me? Chopped liver is NOT Kosher?
Maybe chopped pig liver
~Elissa Cleaveland
"It is nothing short of a miracle that the modern methods of instruction
have
not yet entirely strangled the holy curiosity of inquiry." A. Einstein
